name: ello-brains
description: The brains of ello's react applications.

scripts.link-curator: yarn link && cd ../curator && yarn add file:../brains -E --ignore-scripts && yarn link ello-brains && echo 'run `yarn build:watch` to build the brains on save'
scripts.link-webapp: yarn link && cd ../webapp && yarn add file:../brains -E --ignore-scripts && yarn link ello-brains && echo 'run `yarn build:watch` to build the brains on save'
scripts.unlink-curator: yarn unlink && cd ../curator && yarn remove ello-brains && yarn add https://github.com/ello/brains -E --ignore-scripts
scripts.unlink-webapp: yarn unlink && cd ../webapp && yarn remove ello-brains && yarn add https://github.com/ello/brains -E --ignore-scripts
